==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=开弓没有回头箭|type=2221}}

===Etymology===
* Literally, "The firing of a bow has no returning arrow"→"The arrow won't come back after you shoot the bow."

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=kāigōng méiyǒu huítóu jiàn
|c=hoi1 gung1 mut6 jau5 wui4 tau4 zin3
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# There's no turning back after you make an important decision.
